boss_weaknesses.Dealt Damage: Magic, Fire, Holy, Lightning, Madness, Sleep, Deathblight, Bloodloss, Poison, Scarlet Rot

character_stats.My recommended weapon classes: Greatswords, Straight Swords, Flails, Colossal Weapons, Greataxes, Hammers

magic_cocktail.Name: Pure Magic
magic_cocktail.Effect: Summons a tracking wisp that detonates on contact, dealing periodic magic damage

magic_cocktail.Name: Pure Fire
magic_cocktail.Effect: Creates a whirlwind of flame; AoE fire damage that burns for some time

magic_cocktail.Name: Pure Lightning
magic_cocktail.Effect: Bloodhoundâ€™s Step: greatly enhances dodging actions with lightning

magic_cocktail.Name: Pure Holy
magic_cocktail.Effect: Divine Shield: increases poise and damage negation (defensive buff)

magic_cocktail.Name: Magic/Fire
magic_cocktail.Effect: Summons a wraith flame that pursues and explodes on enemies

magic_cocktail.Name: Magic/Lightning
magic_cocktail.Effect: Carian Slash: broad forward slash with a magical blade

magic_cocktail.Name: Magic/Holy
magic_cocktail.Effect: Grants infinite FP for a short time (magic veil for self and allies)

magic_cocktail.Name: Fire/Lightning
magic_cocktail.Effect: Become a fireball, barrel forward, raining lightning on foes

magic_cocktail.Name: Fire/Holy
magic_cocktail.Effect: Warming Stone: raises max HP and reduces status buildup for allies, lowers enemy max HP

magic_cocktail.Name: Lightning/Holy
magic_cocktail.Effect: Automatic Parry: layer of lightning parries enemy attacks for a short time

magic_cocktail.Name: No Holy
magic_cocktail.Effect: AoE gravity orb pulls in enemies, then explodes for heavy damage

magic_cocktail.Name: No Lightning
magic_cocktail.Effect: Mixed affinity breath: damages enemies, restores HP and FP to allies

magic_cocktail.Name: No Magic
magic_cocktail.Effect: Creates a lightning rod; white lightning strikes after a delay (AoE lightning)

magic_cocktail.Name: No Fire
magic_cocktail.Effect: AoE cold storm, user retreats in ice block and becomes invulnerable

libra_deals_boss.Deal: I wish to have deep faith.
libra_deals_boss.Effect: Respec: Overhauls your stats, making Faith your highest attribute. Variants exist for Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, Arcane.
Gain 1 additional flask, but lose 10% of your maximum HP permanently.

libra_deals_boss.Deal: I want the power of a demon.
libra_deals_boss.Effect: Gain a passive Frenzied Eye that shoots frenzy projectiles over time. Also causes Madness buildup on yourself.

Receive a random weapon from a special list, but lose 2 levels. Possible weapons include: Vykeâ€™s War Spear, Black Knife, Erdtree Bow, Frenzied Flame Seal, Fingerprint Stone Shield, Miquellanâ€™s Knight Sword, Ordovisâ€™s Greatsword, Halo Scythe.

libra_deals_boss.Deal: I want to gain many levels.
libra_deals_boss.Effect: Gain +2 levels, but lose 1 level every time you use a flask thereafter.
Suffer -30% HP, FP, and stamina for 2 minutes, then gain +20% to all three permanently after.

libra_deals_boss.Deal: I want to fight at utmost strength.
libra_deals_boss.Effect: Libra gains 10% defense for 100s. You gain +25% HP and +10% damage for 60s. Libra starts fight in golden form.
Gain +150 resistance to all status effects, but lose 10% max stamina.

libra_deals_boss.Deal: I want to hold death at bay.
libra_deals_boss.Effect: When HP drops to 20%, automatically heal to 100%. However, you permanently lose 20% max HP.

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I wish to have great strength
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Raises Strength but reduces all other stats

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I wish to have great dexterity
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Raises Dexterity but reduces all other stats

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I wish to expand my intellect
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Raises Intelligence but reduces all other stats

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I wish to have deep faith
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Raises Faith but reduces all other stats

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I wish to be in touch with the arcane
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Raises Arcane but reduces all other stats
Increases Resistances by +150, but lose 10% Stamina

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I want to hold death at bay
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Lose 20% max HP. Once per battle, when HP drops to or below 20%, immediately heal back to full HP.
Gain Stamina in exchange for HP and FP
Gain 3 levels but lose a level every time you drink from your flask
Adds a Flask Charge but lose 10% max HP

Lose 2 levels but randomly get one of the following Weapons: Vyke's War Spear, Black Knife, Erdtree Bow, Frenzied Flame Seal, Fingerprint Stone Shield, Miquellan Knight's Sword, Ordovis's Greatsword, Halo Scythe. Passive effects are randomly determined.

Take a -30% HP, FP, and Stamina debuff that lasts for the rest of the day. After that debuff expires at the start of the next day, gain a +20% HP, FP, and Stamina buff permanently. If you die before any of that happens, all aspects of this deal are cancelled.

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I want the power of a demon
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: Grants an demonic eye that shoots enemies, which builds up Madness when used

scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Deal: I want a lot of runes
scale_bearing_merchant_deals_overworld.Effect: For the cost of 10,000 Runes, places the Symbol of Avarice in a vacant talisman slot. Available only during days 1 and 2.
